title: Behind the Candelabra: Slate's Spoiler Special
description:
Slate's Dana Stevens and Dan Kois discuss HBO's Behind The Candelabra. WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
